mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a1.*, @rank := IF (@a = a1.sys_org_code ,@rank + 1, 1) AS 'rank' , @a := a1.sys_org_code FROM sanitation_summary a1 ORDER BY a1.sys_org_code, a1.create_time DESC ) a2, (SELECT @rank := 1 ,@a := NULL) tt WHERE rank = 1 ) a
